## Overview

`iramuteqlike` is an R package with tools to reproduce the [IRaMuTeQ](http://www.iramuteq.org/) software analysis in R. The aim of `iramuteqlike` is to facilitate research work, in addition to contributing to the reproducibility of the research.

The package use other methods to compute some of the analysis, hence, the results can differ from the [IRaMuTeQ](http://www.iramuteq.org/) software.

Please note that `iramuteqlike` is not related in any way with the [IRaMuTeQ](http://www.iramuteq.org/) developer team.

## Installation

You can install `iramuteqlike` from GitHub with:

``` {r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("gipso/iramuteqlike")
```

## Citation

If you use `iramuteqlike` in your research, please consider citing it. We put a lot of work to build and maintain a free and open-source R package. You can find the `iramuteqlike` citation below.

```{r}
citation("iramuteqlike")
```
